title: Valerian for Xanax Withdrawal
author: Anonymous
citation: Anonymous. "Valerian for Xanax Withdrawal: experience with Alprazolam (Xanax) & Valerian (ID 1650)". Erowid.org. Oct 10, 2000. erowid.org/exp/1650
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report: I recently, out of desperation, had to use Valerian to get through withdrawal from 6 mg of Xanax a day. I can honestly say that it works. I wl never take Xanax again and would never recommend it to anyone.
